titleStmt.title: The case of the persecuted and oppressed Protestants in some parts of Germany and Hungary laid open in a memorial which was lately presented at Vienna to his Imperial Majesty / by His Majesty the King of Sweden's Ambassadour Extraordinary, the Count of Oxenstierna.
titleStmt.author: Oxenstierna, Bengt Gabrielsson, greve, 1623-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
